title: Cynthia_sinach042
author: Cynthia_sinach042
content: My country people I greet all of una well well, I hope we all dey okay, I go first like to tell of una say my sis just gave birth successfully not too long ago.The reason why I dey make this post na to showcase how cryptocurrency don dey grow for our country and it's really encouraging for everyone of us. The couples that has the kids are youth and this is their first issue and they know many other youth so I was in charge of the ceremony. Although the naira scarcity has started to reduce in place around the country I no go like take Chances Sha.So I created a Bitcoin, Ethereum and USDT wallet account for the ceremony for any one way go like give to the couples and those that send it gets a paper format with the babies pic, you know we Nigerians like to showoff by spraying.My happiness be say many people actually use the option and it sweet me to see that cryptocurrency do go far for Nigeria and cryptocurrency system fit bring the change wey we need for our money and financial system matter

comments.author: CryptoHeadlineNews
comments.body: Quote from: Cynthia_sinach042 on April 26, 2023, 12:44:17 PMMy country people I greet all of una well well, I hope we all dey okay, I go first like to tell of una say my sis just gave birth successfully not too long ago.Congratulations mate on the birth of a new bouncing baby into your family, because children na truly gifts from God and as senior bros or parents, na our own duty to take good care of them oh as dey don finally arrive this sinful world oh. But shah, which gender nah she born? (Male or Female)QuoteSo I created a Bitcoin, Ethereum and USDT wallet account for the ceremony for any one way go like give to the couples and those that send it gets a paper format with the babies pic, you know we Nigerians like to showoff by spraying.My happiness be say many people actually use the option and it sweet me to see that cryptocurrency do go far for Nigeria That's a really nice initiative oh my guy, and I guess you must be a very sharp M.C oh, for creating the wallet of all this popular crypto assets, for those wey go wan claim say they no get cash and fiat for bank to wire transfer via crypto using any of those  wallets. But moreover, I'm happy the level wey we Nigerians dey put head into this crypto matter, as that show say we be serious hustles and not lazy people.

comments.author: Rruchi man
comments.body: It is not out of the ordinary for cryptocurrency to be accepted in occasions. It is even more common when the people having the occasions know about cryptocurrency and understand that some of the people coming too who are on the guest list know and use bitcoins. Our government has banned spraying of the naira in occasions in the country, many people who have occasions and understand that spraying money adds more color to events have settled for alternatives like printing their own money that people will buy with real cash on the day of the occasion to spray, others know that for people who do not like to show off by spraying, bank account numbers are made available for transfer, and wallet address for other category of people who will prefer to make direct transactions to the wallet of the people who have the occasion without needing to convert it to fiat in a process that can become stressful and discouraging.There will be more occasions where cryptocurrency will be accepted as support.

comments.author: CryptSafe
comments.body: Congratulations on the arrival of a new born baby into your family. Your family is blessed. There is joy in fatherhood and motherhood more especially when the couple's are youths in their prime age. Your initiative is a welcome development just as you have said,  it would be more easier for the couple's as they understand their existing protocol and the caliber of friends they have who are into Crypto.  In Nigeria, the youths are more into Crypto because they understand the Dynamics of change and innovation and they also see the direction of the pendulum and where it is heading to.
